ygData.subject: Re: RE: [EQ-Necromancers] Expansion Spells
ygData.msgSnippet: Does anybody have the list of Necro expansion spells? Also, I d love to see the differing types, it would be nice to have a random one per cast.  Also,
ygData.messageBody:
Does anybody have the list of Necro expansion spells?

Also, I'd love to see the differing types, it would be nice to have a random
one per cast. Also, different effects per pet would be nice.

Zarbon, who thinks everything would be nice.


----- Original Message -----
From: Jason Brown <jasonb@...>
To: 'EQ_Necromancer' <eq_necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, March 02, 2000 8:46 AM
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] RE: [EQ-Necromancers] Expansion Spells


> From: "Jason Brown" <jasonb@...>
>
>
> The Vampirism spell would be really cool -- I'd like to see some new pets
> though. I'm talking about differing types, like demons, ghouls, zombies,
undead
> dracoliches. You know -- the usual. Make them research and high level --
they
> have the same affect as the other pets, just look different. I'd run from
a
> Necro with a 10' tall spikey-horned leather-winged demon walking behind
him that
> said
> "<name> is my master."
>
> Just an idea :P
>
